location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Earle, Military Secretary to the Viceroy, Simla to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Major Charles George Gunning's appointment as Commandant of the Meywar [MewƒÅr] Corps and outlining his credentials and references.The letter goes on to request a report on the state of the Meywar Corps for Lord Northbrook.The letter contains a note from Pelly recording that he replied to the letter 3 July 1873, which may be an error given that the letter was sent to Pelly on 19 July.
